arm_group.description: Acetogenins twice (BID) per day for 12 months

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to confirm the findings of an early study with prostate cancer
      and to expand our knowledge of treating prostate cancer using an
      Adenosine-5'-triphosphate(ATP)inhibitor.

clinical_study.brief_title: Eradication of Prostate Cancer Using an Adenosine-5'-Triphosphate (ATP) Inhibitor

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Clinical diagnosis of prostate cancer

          -  Referred to the study by their treating physician

        Exclusion Criteria:

        - Any type of treatment before starting study

clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Eradication of Prostate Cancer Using an Adenosine-5'-Triphosphate(ATP)Inhibitor.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: A Gleason Score is obtained from the results of a transrectal needle biopsy of the prostate.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
